sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Select, Store } from '@ngxs/store'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { RemoveProduit } from 'src/app/shared/actions/cart-actions'; import { Produit } from 'src/app/models/produit.model'; import { Catalogue } from '../interface/catalogue'; import { CartState } from '../shared/state/cart-state'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { @Select(CartState.getNbProduits) productCount$: Observable; products$: Observable; constructor(private store: Store) { this.products$ = this.store.select((state) => state.panier.produits); } ngOnInit(): void { } removeProduitFromPanier(productIndex: Number) { this.store.dispatch(new RemoveProduit(productIndex)); } }
